Team members are staff, students and long-term visitors (3 months or more) of the group.

## Current team members

```{r, results='asis'}
expanded <- current_team |>
  purrr::map_chr(function(e) {
    knitr::knit_expand(
      "_team_member.Rmd", 
      name = e[["name"]],
      webpage = e[["webpage"]],
      github = e[["github"]],
      twitter = e[["twitter"]],
      bluesky = e[["bluesky"]],
      orcid = e[["orcid"]],
      description = e[["description"]]
    )
  }) |>
  knitr::knit_child(text = _, quiet = TRUE) |>
  cat(sep = "\n")
```

## Former team members

```{r, results='asis'}
former_team <- team[setdiff(names(team), names(current_team))] |>
  purrr::map_chr(function(e) {
    if (is.null(e[["webpage"]]) || e[["webpage"]] == "") {
      e[["name"]]
    } else {
      glue::glue('[{e[["name"]]}]({e[["webpage"]]})')
    }
  }) |>
  cat(sep = " Â· ")
```
